mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_detail (user_id, nickname, phone, bio, gender, birthday, location, last_login_at, create_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{bio}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{location}, #{lastLoginAt}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user_detail SET nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, bio = #{bio}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = #{birthday}, location = #{location}, last_login_at = #{lastLoginAt}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
